explanation: [0-0] The video starts in a gray brick room, with two pixel-style characters standing on a platform above lava. The character on the left is a TV-headed man wearing a green shirt and brown pants, his head a television displaying static. The character on the right is a Crown man in a black suit, wearing a gold crown and sunglasses, and a gold chain around his neck. There's a signboard in the middle of the platform with like and comment icons.

[0-5] Then, the Crown man pushes the TV-headed man and points at him, laughing. At this moment, the platform begins to break, and a Monitor man walks from a black building in the distance, looking around.
